p: The serum samples from patients (n = 50) with suspected CHIK infection during outbreaks in different parts of India from 2015–2018 were referred for molecular diagnosis to DRDE, Gwalior from Gajra Raja Medical College (GRMC), Gwalior. The serum samples collected between day 1 to 7 after onsets of specific symptoms were used in this study. Along with this, apparently healthy serum samples were collected from healthy individuals (n = 20) were kept as negative control.
